DownloadFile

public static int DownloadFile(java.lang.String ftpserver,
                               java.lang.String username,
                               java.lang.String passwd,
                               java.lang.String sourcefile,
                               java.lang.String destinationfile)
Download a file from a remote server

Parameters:
ftpserver - String IP address of the ftp server
username - String Username
passwd - String Password
sourcefile - String Filename and path of the source remote file with path
destinationfile - String Filename and path of the local destination file with path
Returns:
int 0 - correct 1 - cannot download file 2 - cannot disconnect
